alert.note: Alert for West Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Polk and south central McMinn Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Etowah, or 8 miles north of Benton, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Benton, Etowah, Reliance, Archville, Hiwassee Ocoee State Park and Dentville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
